name: Twitter Streaming: Get a (random) sample of tweets from Twitter
description:
Fetches a live (and presumably random) sample from the Twitter Streaming API via the sample-endpoint (https://stream.twitter.com/1.1/statuses/sample.json). No parameters mmust be specified. 


 See https://dev.twitter.com/docs/api/1.1/get/statuses/sample for more information on the Streaming-API
